qas.question: In what year was General Electric formed?
In which US state was GE incorporated?
Which city was the home of GE's first headquarters?
Who led the Thomson-Houston Electric Company when GE was formed?
Where was the Thomson-Houston Electric Company based?
Where was Drexel, Morgan & Co incorporated?
In what year was Canadian General Electric formed?
When was Drexel, Morgan & Co incorporated>
Where was Canadian General Electric based?
Where was Thomson-Houston Electric Company headquartered?

context: At about the same time, <a3_0>Charles Coffin<a3_0/>, leading the Thomson-Houston Electric Company, acquired a number of competitors and gained access to their key patents. General Electric was formed through the <a0_0><b6_0><b7_0>1892<b7_0/><b6_0/><a0_0/> merger of Edison General Electric Company of <b8_0>Schenectady, New York<b8_0/>, and Thomson-Houston Electric Company of <a4_0><b5_0><b9_0>Lynn, Massachusetts<b9_0/><b5_0/><a4_0/>, with the support of Drexel, Morgan & Co. Both plants continue to operate under the GE banner to this day. The company was incorporated in <a1_0>New York<a1_0/>, with the <a2_0>Schenectady<a2_0/> plant used as headquarters for many years thereafter. Around the same time, General Electric's Canadian counterpart, Canadian General Electric, was formed.
